ygData.subject: RE: Dwarven Cleric
ygData.msgSnippet: There are ways to make 200pp+ in around an hour, but they are not doable at level 15.  I also hope they fix the faction issue involved so that the people
ygData.messageBody:
There are ways to make 200pp+ in around an hour, but they are not "doable"
at level 15. I also hope they fix the faction issue involved so that the
people that use it will pay in the long run. Needless to say, it has been
reported multiple times.

Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
Solusek Ro




that is the thing I will not say....and the answer to why not is a good
reason. How many are on this list? how many are looking for ways to make a
quick buck? and how quickly would MY strategy on this be flooded if I was
to give it up?
-----Original Message-----
From: Chris Wheeler [mailto:wheelech@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 20, 1999 11:04 AM
To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Dwarven Cleric


how?
-----Original Message-----
From: Ralph Carothers [mailto:CarothersR@...]
Sent: 1999/10/20 11:05 AM
To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Dwarven Cleric


i'd say there are VERY profitable ways to hunt....i log
in....havent played in two weeks....and in the first hour I'm back I make
250 pp....that's a nice lil cash sum ;)



Bann
